sense.def:
There is a frost
rečemo, kadar zunanja temperatura pade pod ledišče in so tla pokrita z ledenimi kristali.

seg.quote: There was a touch of frost this morning.
Even into April the frosts continued.

sense.def:
Frost
je tanka plast ledenih kristalov, ki nastanejo na tleh, kadar je zelo mrzlo.

seg.quote: The lawn was sparkling with frost.
